m_szDocTitle: China and Solar Industry Growth | The Energy Collective
m_szDocSumamry: 1 Posted December 11, 2013 Keywords: Electricity , Energy Security , Tech , Solar Power , Sustainability , Utilities , Efficiency , Cleantech , Renewables , China , Energy and Economy , Fuels , News , china solar , industry growth   Chinese state news has announced that the country’s on-grid solar power capacity will reach 10 GW by the end of 2013, a 200% increase from a year ago, based on figures forecast by the National Energy Administration.
